name: A-Train de Ikou Hirogaru Kankou Line
Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Digital Deluxe Edition
Attack Retrieve Capture
summary: Attack Retrieve Capture was a free multiplayer, 2D computer game created by John Vechey and Brian Fiete, who would go on to co-found PopCap Games, as a college project and was later published by Hoopy Entertainment in 1995. The game was primarily capture the flag, but other game modes existed.

name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
(Content of "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition")
- The game "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout"
- Costume Set "Another Fashion"
- Costume Set "Summer Style"
- Hideout Parts "Pixie Forest"
- Hideout Parts "Lakeside Hideout"
- Initial Dash Item Set
- Extra Large! Rebuild Gem Pack

The concept of this title, the latest in the series to depict a new "Atelier" world, is "True-to-life youths that develop together, even if just a little bit".
It is the story of a girl and her friends who are about to become adults, discovering what is most important to them.
To depict the story of the main characters discovering things they've never seen before, we've created fields with natural shadows that allow you to feel the breath of the world. Graphics have been further enhanced, allowing for a world of daily-life and adventure to be depicted in a new way.

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy - Digital Deluxe Edition
Atomic Heart: Premium Edition
summary: The Premium Edition includes Atomic Heart, the Atomic Pass, two unique weapon skins and a digital artbook.In a mad utopian world, fight for freedom against robots in spectacular combat. If you want to reach the truth, you'll have to pay in blood.

name: Atomic Heart: Gold Edition
summary:
The Gold Edition includes the base game Atomic Heart and the Atomic Pass.

In a mad utopian world, fight for freedom against robots in spectacular combat. If you want to reach the truth, you'll have to pay in blood.

name: Atomicrops: Deerly Beloved
summary: It's harvest time down on the farm and we're gearing up to get spoooOOOooooky (please read that in a ghost voice). The Deerly Beloved DLC is the latest, Halloween-themed DLC for Atomicrops with a ton of eerie new additions and upgrades!

name: Atlas Reactor: Necrolancer Freelancer Six Pack
summary: Unlock six of Atlas' most fearsome freelancers, then unleash true darkness with 8 sinister skins.

name: Atom RPG: Trudograd - War Supply Pack
summary: War Supply Pack for Atom RPG: Trudograd was created to allow more character customization options to those players who have already purchased the game, but still want to support our small team.

name: ATSF Wagon Pack 01
summary: This Wagon Pack contains a selection of 6 wagons themed around the ATSF railroad in the United States.

name: Atomic Heart: Limited Edition
summary: Pre-order Atomic Heart &ndash Limited Edition Bundle now to get the game's official Steelbook, an artbook made by the studio, a metal poster, the game on the platform of your choice and the Labour & Science weapon skin pack DLC!

name: Atlanta 1864
summary: Refight the battle for Atlanta during the American Civil War in 1864.

name: Atop the Witch's Tower
summary: A ZZT game about opening up.

name: Attack Tactic
summary: Attack Tactic mixes top-down turn-based combat with classic dungeon crawling for a unique strategic experience. Explore, upgrade, and fight as you devise clever plans to safely make your way deeper into hostile dungeons and through enemy territory.

name: Attack on King: Reloaded
summary: As the king, you have to fight for your kingdom with all your might. Move carefully, load your gun, aim at the enemy king and shoot without fail. With your smart strategies, you will fight your way through all levels and proudly take back what is rightfully yours with supreme glory.

name: Atak
summary: Atak is a real time strategy action game with fast paced battles and chaotic outcomes. Fight your way through the singleplayer campaign, challenge a friend in a custom battle or explore a multitude of minigames.

name: Atom RPG: Trudograd Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition consists of Atom RPG: Trudograd, a game by the Atom Team studio, as well as two DLCs: The Supporter Pack and the War Supply Pack.

name: Atsumete Godzilla
summary: A VMU game released with Godzilla Generations.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Atomic Cannon
summary: Atomic Cannon is a fun arcade game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. In this strategic tank artillery duel you battle against computers or friends on 25 different landscapes. Players take turns aiming and firing at each other with over 100 weapons of mass destruction including nuclear bombs.

name: Atomic Picnic
summary:
Atomic Picnic is a Co-Op Shooter Roguelite based on the new Swarm Survivors genre! Get together with up to 4 friends to fight frenzied monsters and gain experience to upgrade your weapons in an anime-style post-apocalyptic world.

Fight your way together through The Zone, an everchanging labyrinth created after the "Harvest Festival" happened. Unlock an incredible variety of upgrades that can radically change the way you play every time.

name: Attack of the Mutant Artificial Trees
summary: A free online video game developed as part of a marketing campaign by the National Christmas Tree Association in 2004. The game was meant to support the natural Christmas tree industry and received criticism from artificial tree producers. It has been described as similar to Whac-A-Mole.

name: Atari Recharged Collection 1
summary: Atari Recharged Collection 1 is on a region-free physical cart for the PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4.

name: Atari Recharged Collection 2
summary: Atari Recharged Collection 2 is on a region-free physical cart for the PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4.

name: Attic
summary:
Attic is a Yume Nikki fangame developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

You explore Aurore's dream world. The goal of the game is to explore and find effects.

name: Atlantis no Puzzle
summary: A short exploration puzzle-platformer where you search for items and decide which one to bring over to your next life every time you die.

name: Atlas Gate
summary: Stranded on an island of paper, find your way off or stay and see it decay.

name: Ataque dos vermes
summary: A game usually released in Master System-based Plug & Play consoles.

name: Attack on Reality
summary:
Attack on Reality is an accurate recreation of the popular anime/manga, Attack on Titan, in Virtual Reality.
Take control of a scout as you fly through the air with Omni-Directional Gear.

name: Atomic Spider
summary:
You are an Atomic Spider! Created in a lab, you are now our universe's only hope to fend off alien interlopers from another dimension.
Atomic Spider introduces a new touchscreen game mechanic married to intense gameplay and bright vector-style visuals. Battle your way through 50+ levels chock full of tricky monsters and bosses.

name: Atum
summary: Atum is a mod for Minecraft developed by Shadowclaimer that adds a new desert dimension containing over ten new mobs, over twenty-five unique artifacts to find and use, dungeons, ruins, and temples.

name: Atomic Pursuit
summary:
A nuclear war aproaches, the entire planet is in serious danger. The last hope of the mankind is the space.
Some countries are sending their first missions looking for a new planet to colonize.
Choose your side, try to go the far as you can and became a national hero.
Be careful, your travel will be plenty of dangers. Keep an eye on the oxygen levels of your spaceship and take care of asteroids, they´ll be your worst enemy.

name: Atom Fit
summary: Atom Fit is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: A Tower Full of Cats
summary: A Tower Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet cats through the whole history of mankind... and beyond!

name: At Last not Last
summary:
There is a very special forest. You wouldn't believe how many out-of-the-way things have happened there recently. For one, animals started racing to see who is the fastest. Maybe running from foxes is just too boring for them, I don't know.
I won't even start about the gigantic mushrooms that have sprung up after the last drizzle. And those massive holes in the ground! I dread to think of a creature that made those.

name: Attack of the Killer Beast
summary: Attack of the Killer Beast is a Friday Night Funkin' mod inspired by the YTPMV "Attack of the Killer Beast", featuring Skitzy's performance of MrBeast from the rap battle Squid Game vs MrBeast. The mod also features additional playable characters such as Barack Obama and Walter White.

name: Attack of the Trolls!
summary:
Attack of the Trolls! was a Flash game by Maker Studio that was released on Ray William Johnson's website in 2011. The game was described as a Zelda clone by comments about the game online.

As of 2023, no copy of the game has resurfaced and currently it is lost media.

name: A Test Before Jianghu
summary: It's a story about the mountains before we came to Jianghu You can play a boy or a girl, figure out your identity, collect G's, and win the test

name: Attack Zone
summary: Attack Zone is an FPS Shooter. You are placed in an attack zone and must fight for your survival.

name: At the Dream End
summary: After mind transfer into a body of a young wolf-human hybrid, you set out to stop a person on the verge of destroying our planet. A person addressed as Butcher.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg
summary:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

The remake changes include:
Character designs and event illustrations have been revamped, 2D animations have added and there are now 3D models of characters and stages.

The tutorial and navigation of the game’s features have been expanded and improved. The methods of moving around the city and collecting items in the field has been modified to meet modern-day demands, making it more comfortable and easier to play.

The new Unlimited Mode, which allows you to play at a more relaxed pace by removing the five year deadline, and the addition of new events that enable interactions with new characters.

name: A Terrible Place
summary: What seems like a simple mission turns into a fight for survival as the island wakes up to greet its new arrivals.

name: A Traveler to Unknown Thule
summary: Adventure Game Traveling around Iceland.

name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy - Ultimate Edition
Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland - Additional Character: Meruru
Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland - Additional Character: Totori
Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - New Quest: Piles of Coll Quest
Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - New Quest: Loads of Exp Quest
Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Battle Mix Secret Teachings
Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Lucia
Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings - Ilmeria
Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout - Secret Solitary Island
Atomic Surf
summary: Atomic Surf is a VR supported retro arcade shooter where you ride a rocket through lush, challenging landscapes and blast your way through hordes of alien droids with an arsenal of futuristic weapons. Fight solo or with a friend in full campaign co-op.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Ultimate Edition
summary: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: Attack on Hex Island
summary: A cute and approachable turn-based deck builder/card battler that combines the battle systems from Tetra Master/Triple Triad and Pokémon. Collect, upgrade, and customize your party to strategically defeat your opponents and save them from the attack on Hex Island.

name: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon
summary: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon is a dangerously goofy RPG with fast paced, unique combat and zany secrets and adventures. Your goal is to build your own rhapsody, the story of you - the player - an experience which cannot be replicated by others.

name: Atham Battle Simulator
summary: Fight your way to glory by conquering humans, demons & corrupted veggies in "Atham Battle Simulator". Don't let the bananas scare you from not playing this!

name: Attorney of the Arcane
summary: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane is an interactive murder mystery. You play as a defense attorney who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent. However, the system is corrupt to its core and manipulated by the aristocracy. Will you acquit your innocent clients in light of that? Or will you fall before a corrupt judicial system?

name: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition
summary: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition is a Focus Entertainment Store exclusive product, strictly limited to 100 copies worldwide. It includes an exclusive artwork by the game's Senior Concept Artist Janine Bertet alongside Art Director James Lowe as a numbered laminated wooden frame (artwork printed on wood), a certificate of authenticity hand-signed by the artist, a digital or a physical copy of the game for the platform of your choice using James Lowe’s artwork as an exclusive box art and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC.

name: A Taça Mágica
summary: A Taça Mágica is a text-based adventure where you are tasked with searching a magic goblet.

name: Atomic Blast
summary: Atomic Blast is a tricky platformer with a plethora of dangers to keep your eye on. The protagonist may have a gun, but that won’t help much if he can’t dodge the enemy soldiers and death lasers that will cut him up with a single shot.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Endless Summer Splash! Costume Set
summary: Swimsuits for Ryza and her friends! Adds 11 swimsuits, one for each party member.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Summer Look Costume Set
summary: Summer outfits for Atelier Ryza 3! Adds 7 summer costumes, one each for Ryza, Klaudia, Lent, Tao, Empel, Lila, and Bos.

name: Atom Antics
summary: Professor Twiddie's Atom Antics is addictive, entertaining and fun puzzle game. It's the ultimate brain challenge for you. Proof that you are genius. Help Professor Twiddie. Touch and slide the atoms around the playfield to match the pattern shown on the small image.

name: Attack From the Void
summary: A top-down shooter set in a ship travelling to the solar system's edge. Make your way through the aliens attacking the ship, search for other crew members, and stay alive.

name: Atmosfar
summary: Atmosfar is a sky-high odyssey set on an alien planet of floating islands explored by flying crafts and a mobile airbase as you uncover the fate of your collapsed colony.

name: Atmos Quake
summary: The legions of space pirates are causing solar flares and sending shock waves ro destroy your planet. You must fly in and arrest them all.

name: A Thesis for Truth
summary: An interactive fiction game.

name: Atom
summary:
Atom is an interesting idle game where you can collect all the known elements from Hydrogen to Oganesson.
In this idle game you will be able to go from Schoolboy to Professor with a worldwide reputation

name: Atari Flashback Portable
summary: The first edition of Atari Flashback Portable contains 60 games.

name: Atlantis Academy
summary: Arcane magic bubbles up from a forgotten city…can you harness the power of the depths? You’ve tamed a feral water dragon and are now eligible to train alongside other magical merfolk at the Academy. A sublime, underwater fantasy RPG!

name: Atari Flashback
summary: The Atari Flashback is a dedicated console that resembles the Atari 7800 and uses similar controls. The system has 15 Atari 2600 and 5 Atari 7800 games built in.

name: Atari Flashback 2
summary:
The Atari Flashback 2 is the successor to the Atari Flashback and includes 40 Atari 2600 games including homebrews and unreleased prototypes.

It also contains two hidden games: Warlords and Super Breakout.

name: A Turtle In A Hare-Machine
summary: An erotic horror game.

name: A Tiny Sticker Tale
summary: A Tiny Sticker Tale is a cozy miniature adventure about changing the world, using the power of stickers!

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Full original game “Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg”
Gust Extra BGM Pack
"Another Look" Costume Set（Set of 33)

name: Atlas Earth: Buy Virtual Land
summary: Atlas: Earth is a location-based app where users can buy virtual land that mirrors real-world locations, 900 square feet at a time. Purchase land anywhere near your physical location in the real world and it’s yours to keep!

name: Attack of the Silver Ball
summary:
A pinball simulator that allows you to play on three dimensional tables: Mafia Madness and Paladin Wing.

Paladin Wing is a pinball fan’s dream. A hardcore realistic table right down to the rail support beams and iron bolts, Paladin Wing is a fast paced board with an unprecedented supply of features, modes, and innovations such as the addition of RPG elements to gameplay.

Mafia Madness takes the fantasy approach to pinball, and makes full use of 3d acceleration to render a wildly surreal table. Packed with features and extra games, Mafia Madness draws you into its colorful world and keeps you coming back. All in all, a pinball game like no other!

A third table, Battle for Planet X, was also planned and mentioned in demo information.

name: Atganga: Spectacle for the Gods
summary: A 4-player local party fighter with draft mechanics where no fight will ever feel the same. Everyone starts at the same basic level but grow in power upon drafting godly items. Build synergies, find the way you like to play and become the last viking standing in Atganga: Spectacle for the Gods.

name: Atomgrad
summary: A linguistic detective game. Decrypt the Soviet computer to prevent total nuclear annihilation.

name: Atomic Survivors
summary: Atomic Survivors is an arena shooter with minimalistic gameplay and simplistic roguelike elements in which you have to fend off many waves of opponents. Collect Resin every run to buy one of several upgrades of your choice. And remember: for best results, choose wisely.

name: Atlantia
summary:
A journalist from the Fame magazine, along with a photographer, is sent on the maiden voyage of the luxury cruise ship Atlantia. The assignment is to get an interview from the sheikh of Harrout -- the owner of the ship.

Aboard, several sudden explosions rock the ship, and a voice from the announcement system tells: We are sinking! Get to the lifeboats immediately

name: Atari 4 Player Football
summary: 4-player version of Atari Football.

name: Attack Force
summary: Arcade Military shooter developed by Electronic Games Systems in 1979.

name: Attack UFO
summary: Space Invaders clone released by Ryuto Electric Co. in 1980.

name: ATV Track
summary: A four-wheel motorcycle racing simulator with four different circuits and two selectable modes: Practice and Competition.

name: A Thug's Ascension
summary: A Thug's Ascension is a low-poly action-adventure / FPS story set in the dying city of Maratha, circa 2023. Become Chief, a feared mercenary, and experience a dark, slow-paced, character-driven crime drama marrying cinematic dialogue-driven storytelling with intense shooting and driving gameplay.

name: Atari Tabletops Collection #1
summary:
In a parallel universe, Atari made physical tabletops/Game & Watch games from their biggest hits from VCS and Jaguar consoles. The best thing is that they also put them out as a Lynx compilation...

This was an entry into the AC2016 24 hour coding contest.

Includes Egglords and Tempeggs.

name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable
summary: Fight for your life against man-eating Titans in Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable. In a thrilling mix of hunting and action, join the Scout Regiment and put on your Omni Directional Mobility Gear to defend and protect humanity against the Titans.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Additional Area "Rosca Island"
summary:
Adds a new region (open field) and World Quests unique to that region.
This content requires the game clear data in order to play.

name: Athena Crisis
summary: Athena Crisis is a modern retro turn-based strategy game inspired by Advance Wars. Athena Crisis places you in command of distinct units including infantry, tanks, and air forces in your journey across multiple worlds. Embark on a challenging single-player quest or dive into the thrill of ranked or casual multiplayer modes.

name: Atlas Fallen: Limited Edition
summary: Pre-order Atlas Fallen:\ Limited Edition now to get the game's official Steelbook, a metal poster, the game on the platform of your choice and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC!

name: Atlas Endgames
summary: Squad up and embark on a quest to become the ultimate champion of the Atlas Endgames, a tournament where ruthless heroes from across the galaxy fight to pursue fortune, glory, or a burning desire for revenge.

name: Atrevete a Soñar
summary:
Musical game based on the TV hit "Atrévete a Soñar" (Dare to Dream), where you can choose your favorite character (Patito or Antonella) and perform the series' songs by singing, dancing, or doing various things at the same time. The video game takes advantage of the motion detection of the Wii Remote and features a specially designed microphone for the console.

Patito and Antonella compete with their respective teams to see which one is the best in school. The winning group will advance to intercollegiate eliminations and then to national competitions. As they progress through the different stages of the competition, each protagonist must overcome the obstacles posed by their respective rivals with the help of their loved ones.

Become a Popular or a Divina! Take your singing and dancing to the stage using the Wii Remote and the microphone.
Includes twenty songs from the show "Atrévete a Soñar" and nineteen characters from the series.
Play with up to four friends in multiplayer mode.
There are over fifty items to customize your character.

name: At the Dream End 2: Beyond Gods
summary: How does one confront the unfathomable horror of knowing too much, of peering into the abyss and finding a reflection of their own insignificance? Horror sci-fi visual novel/choose your own adventure game with tons of lore and intriguing concepts about the universe, bio-experiments, and life itself.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Additional Area - Ashra-am Baird Outlying Areas
summary: Adds an area featuring the outlying regions of Ashra-am Baird! Adds a new exploration area and World Quests based on the outlying regions of the royal capital, Ashra-am Baird featured in Atelier Ryza 2.

name: Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct
summary: Continue the story in the Annihilation Instinct DLC and learn what happened to this dystopian world after the climax of Atomic Heart. Prepare to embark on a journey through the new mind-bending Mendeleev Complex and its surrounding swamps, and discover the truth about NORA as Major P-3 is pulled back into Facility 3826. Survive vicious, shape-shifting new enemies and take them down using two cunning new weapons - ranged one the Secateur and melee one the Klusha - as well as your glove’s new Techno-Stasis ability, allowing you to manipulate time itself. Meet a new enigmatic character, as well as returning ones in surprising circumstances and dive deep into the AI’s insanity to curb its Annihilation Instinct.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg Digital Deluxe Upgrade Pack
summary: An upgrade set featuring the original game "Atelier Marie Plus," extra costumes, and BGM.

name: Atlantis: Alien Space Shooter
summary:
You are Earth's last hope!
Entrusted with the most advanced submarines, your mission is to defend humanity against swarms of alien monsters emerged from the oceans.
Shower the enemies with rains of bullets while dodging their vicious attacks with your masterful maneuvers. Recover treasured technology from the lost civilization of Atlantis to power up your fleet.

name: Attachment Not Found
summary: Attachment Not Found is a horror game where your sister goes missing and you decide to explore her myspace page to find out why.

name: Attack on IO
summary:
Attack on IO is a 7 map wad with themes of tech bases, castles and bloody unholy landscapes. It has you stationed on the moon of IO and has you being dragged through hell and back.

This wad features custom textures by Ukiro (Otex) and music by Jason "Jay" Reichard and Jimmy Paddock.

All levels have been designed with pistol start in mind, although you can also play continuously.

name: Atominous
summary:
Inspect every inch of a contaminated household.
Quarantine hazardous materials.
Encounter residents.
Put yourself in danger.
Be a professional.

name: A thousand words that I could tell you
summary: After finding a mysterious necklace that allows her to travel back in time, a girl decides to use it to fix her troubled past.

name: A True Story
summary: A True Story is a turn-based strategy RPG based on "A True Story" (a sci-fi story from the 2nd century) by Lucian of Samosata.

name: Atmospheric Extinction
summary:
Atmospheric Extinction is a Boom (-complevel 9) mapset comprised of 9 maps divided into 3 distinct and action-packed episodes.

This project began when I was messing around with OTEX and trying to see if I could come up with some interesting layouts with a sense of progression, interconnectivity, and be fun/rewarding to explore.

name: Ataxia
summary: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
summary: A new entry of the Atelier series makes it way to mobile and PC! Venture into the lands of Lantana and experience the story of Resna crafted by renowned writer Takahiro. The project is being overseen by Atelier series supervisor, Shinichi Yoshiike, while the character designs have been created by Umiugeso and tokki.

name: Atonement
summary:
A collection of 33 new levels for Doom II, ranging from sprawling shootouts to claustrophobic challenge maps.

Designed for both single player and cooperative modes.

There's one brand new enemy, and a new final boss, but otherwise the gameplay is just like Classic Doom.

name: Atrophy
summary: Atrophy is a boom-compatible map which heavily focuses on atmosphere and exploration. It takes around 30 minutes to beat on first playthrough. Difficulty-wise it should be accessible to most players who've played pwads before, although it can kill you if you're not careful.

name: AtmaSphere 2
summary: Embark on a frosty medieval journey! Guide your ball through snowy platforms, conquer obstacles, hidden challenges, and collect pickups. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, brace yourself for a chilling adventure! Roll to victory in this winter realm!

name: Atrion Project
summary: A sci-fi platformer game where you play an hybrid made in a laboratory. Collect the pieces of your crashed ship to reveal your true identity and accomplish your mission. Use your cybernetic weapons to fight unique alien creatures in varied and original environments.

name: ATV Monster Racing Simulator Rally Cross
summary: Are you ready for the ultimate ATV off-road racing adventure?

name: Attenborough's Antarctic: An Exploration of Life in the Freezer
summary:
This is a program of exploration and discovery with David Attenborough as your guide. Go wherever your fancy takes you, and experience the savageness, beauty and abundance of life in the coldest place on Earth.
Welcome to the South Pole and the surrounding area, one of the most extraordinary places on our planet. In this richly illustrated title, you can investigate the Antarctic terrain, its seasons and the animals that live there.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Recipe Expansion Pack - Alchemy Mysteries
summary: Useful new recipes and ingredients for synthesis! Adds new recipes, traits, and Super Traits that can be used in synthesis. Also adds new ingredients that can be gathered from various areas.

name: At Light Speed
summary: An extremely challenging 3D platformer. After crash landing, you must find your way home through an obscenely dangerous asteroid belt. This world is filled with massive jump challenges, all to be completed on just one life.

name: At Winter's End
summary: At Winter's End is a cozy narrative dice-rolling RPG about 12-year-old Noel growing up in the forest of spirits. Explore the forest and complete quests while rolling dice to see how Noel responds to the challenges they face.

name: Athos
summary: Welcome to a captivating journey into the world of Athos. Build a formidable base to protect yourself from the wild and unpredictable environment, and master the art of taming mighty dinosaurs to be your loyal companions. Welcome to a world where survival is not just a choice but a way of life!

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Recipe Expansion Pack - Art of Adventure
summary: Gain the upper hand in combat with new recipes! Adds new item recipes that can be used in combat. Also adds new ingredients associated with the (Core Ingredients) category that can be gathered from various areas.

name: Ataraxie
summary: Ataraxie, in the pure style of retro games, ties itself with the SNES Gaming era and embrace difficulty, for it wishes to give experienced gamers/players the test they are really looking for!

name: Atari's Freeway for MSX-BASIC 2
summary: This game was projected to be fit in 10 lines and also show how to move all the 32 sprites of MSX in a fast way although the low speed of MSX-BASIC. The achieve this, the sprites trajectory need to be pre-renderized and the game takes about 3:20 minutes before to be ready to play. Please be patient!

name: At the Edge of the World
summary: A lone fisherman sits at the edge of the world. Something stirs inside of him. It wants to be fed.

name: Atrophy: XCIX
summary: Atrophy: XCIX is a first person action horror adventure that takes place in an abandoned hospital in the north of England. You will play as a high ranking officer supervising a patrol on the outskirts of a small town.

name: Atom Smasher
summary: A battle to the last atom! The Atomic Arena is where all sorts of nasty, burly life-forms come to contest each other in the galaxy's deadliest game! Armed with a regulation Atom Smasher Blaster, you must blast unstable atomic particles past your opponent and out of the arena, but if one hits you, it degrades your very atomic structure, and the results aren't pretty. But remember, someone else has the same goal...

name: Atoms and Time
summary: Survive, evolve, and adapt in a rapidly changing world. Survive the test of time, and become an integral part of your world's biosphere. Or play God and build a full ecosystem in seconds.

name: Atama no Kaiten no Training: Rubik's Cube & Chou Yuumei Puzzle Tachi
Atomic Hazard
summary: Atomic Hazard is a action puzle platformer. Take advantage of your environment in physics-based movement and combat.

name: Atari Gamestation Pro
summary: The Gamestation Pro has over 200 games, including Atari 2600, Atari 5200, Atari 7800, Atari arcade and bonus games.

name: ATV Offroad Simulator 24
summary: Are you ready for the real offroad experience with ATV Offroad Simulator 24? Discover the excitement of ATV riding in an adventure-filled, open world.

name: A Tale of Two Lovers
summary: A Tale of Two Lovers store is a visual novel game for adults only. This game is about two young lovers who like to love each other after the day's rush.

name: At the Gates of Midian
summary: Two maps: a large Metal/Wood fortress in the mountains and a small end battle arena, featuring some modified Fiends and Shamblers. Conveys a certain DOOM-like atmosphere.

name: Atrocity Arise
summary: Large Knave-textured castle with libraries and a courtyard. The map source is included.

name: Athletics Mania
summary: Join a competition in track and field events. Running, jumping, throwing, pentathlon, heptathlon or decathlon, you can play all of these in Athletics Mania. Train, improve your skills, show your talent and win a gold medal in the biggest stadiums around the world. Do you have what it takes to stay on top of leaderboards and rankings in this summer sports game?

name: A-Train Evolution Pack
summary: This edition includes the PlayStation version of AIV: Evolution Global, a PlayStation Mouse, an A-Train mousepad, and a PlayStation memory card.

name: Athena
summary: In this action-adventure game, players embark on a mythical journey as Athena, the Goddess of Wisdom, who leaves her castle to explore the perilous Fantasy World beyond. As you navigate through diverse environments, from sky to sea, you'll face an array of strange and formidable creatures. Discover and wield various weapons, including a ball and chain, bow and arrow, and a powerful sword to combat your foes. The game offers unique gameplay elements, allowing Athena to transform into different forms - donning wings to soar through the skies or becoming a mermaid to delve into ocean depths. This blend of Greek mythology, shape-shifting abilities, and varied combat creates an engaging and fantastical gaming experience.

name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes
summary: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes was released for Game Boy in 1992 and although it uses the same cover as the original NES game, it is not a port of that version. The Game Boy version was developed by Equilibrium and published by THQ in Europe and the US. It was also released in Japan, where it was published by Altron in 1993.

name: A Taste for Blood
summary: 6-map episode for Doom 2. These maps, ranging from small to large, hopefully combines good detail and atmosphere with, at times, strong difficulty.

name: A Touch of Magic
summary: A Touch of Magic is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel set in the fictional city of Solestra Hills, a safe heaven for magical beings but full of mafias, drugs and depravity. Play as Giovanni Beneventi and go on a journey filled with drama, comedy, a dark conspiracy and lots of sex.

name: Atomic Tomb
summary: A level for Ultimate Doom + a port that will up the vis-plane limit and is compatible with boom. Shortly after Deimos vanished, the hellspawn appeared on Mars and Earth. Blah Blah Blah, you are a private UAC marine stationed on Mars, and your buddies are gone. Grab your shotgun and take some of the uglies out!

name: Atolladero
summary: A single map with enough detail to make things interesting, along with different combat situations, from long range to close quarters.

name: Atari Mini Arcade
summary: An officially licensed collectable retro mini arcade featuring the legendary Centipede and 4 other amazing games! Adventure, Sprint Master, Gravitar and Yars' Revenge offer you true retro gaming from the start of a global revolution. Experience the classics and collect the range.

name: A Twisted Path To Renown
summary:
A Twisted Path To Renown: is a Multiplayer, loot-focused, PvEvP extraction shooter, set in the rugged 1899 United States!
Strap on your holster, assemble a posse, and get ready for a rootin'-tooting good time!
Roam the savage lands of the United States during the 1890s and live out your Western dream!
Fight against vicious bandits, or become one yourself as you loot and pillage from the Hills of Tennessee to the Pine forests of Arizona. Fight various factions in an unforgiving land for fame, and fortune!
Stay alert for ferocious wild boars, and bandits who will tan your hide for a chance to steal your precious loot!
Evade the resourceful and cunning Indigenous Peoples of early America to fight another day or attack against all odds for your chance at Legend!

name: Atari Flashback X
summary:
The Atari Flashback X was released in 2019 and attempts to capitalize on the mini console trend, started by releases like the NES Classic Edition and Sega Genesis Mini, by being a near perfect physical replica of an Atari 2600 in miniature form. Like the previous releases, it was built by AtGames.

The basic model includes two wired controllers and 110 games. The deluxe model includes 10 additional games. A firmware update through the AtGames website allows both models to download more games.

name: Attack Strategy: Battle Simulator Accurate
summary: Precision and Power Unite – Master the Battlefield!

name: Atari Flashback 2+
summary:
It includes 20 classic Atari 2600 games and 20 new Atari games. The game lineup is mostly the same as the original Flashback 2. However, games such as Pitfall!, River Raid, and Wizard do not appear, and are instead replaced by sports games.
A third hidden game, Circus Atari, was added.

name: Atari Flashback 3
summary: The Atari Flashback 3 was manufactured by AtGames, and was released in September 2011. The Flashback 3 includes 60 built-in Atari 2600 games, 2 joysticks, and a case design that is similar to the Flashback 2. Unlike its predecessors, the Flashback 3 uses emulation.

name: Atari Flashback 4
summary:
The Atari Flashback 4 was released by AtGames on November 13, 2012. The console looks similar to its predecessor, but includes wireless joystick controllers. Like its predecessor, the Flashback 4 uses emulation. The console increased its library to 75 games, 15 more than the Flashback 3.

AtGames also released several alternate versions, including the Atari Flashback 4: 40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition. This included a set of replica Atari 2600 paddles, five collectible posters, and a copy of the original Atari joystick patent signed by Nolan Bushnell. AtGames also developed the Atari Flashback 64, a Walmart exclusive version with wired controllers and only 64 games, including Space Invaders. Some versions of the Flashback 4 include a 76th "bonus" game, Millipede.

name: Atari Flashback 5
summary: The Atari Flashback 5 was released on October 1, 2014. Like the previous two releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 4 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds 17 more games, increasing the total to 92 games.

name: Atari Flashback 6
summary: The Atari Flashback 6 was released on September 15, 2015. Like the previous three releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 5 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds 8 more games, increasing the total to 100 games.

name: Atari Flashback 7
summary:
The Atari Flashback 7 was released on October 1, 2016. Like the previous four releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 6 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds one more game - Frogger - increasing the total to 101 games.

The Atari Flashback 7 Deluxe includes two wired paddle controllers in addition to the wireless joysticks.

name: Atari Flashback 8 Classic
summary: The Atari Flashback 8 was released in September 2017, by AtGames. Several variations were released. A basic model, the Flashback 8 Classic, features 105 games and two wired controllers. The Flashback 8 Deluxe is identical, except that it includes a set of paddle controllers in addition to the joysticks.

name: Atari Flashback 9
summary: The Atari Flashback 9 was released on November 15, 2018, by AtGames. It includes two wired controllers and 110 games.

name: Atari Flashback 9 Gold
summary: The Atari Flashback 9 Gold includes 120 games and wireless controllers.

name: Atari Flashback X Deluxe
summary: The deluxe model includes 10 additional games.

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition
summary:
The Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition was released in 2022 at limited retailers. Physically it is a slight re-coloration of the Atari Flashback X. It features brass switches instead of chrome and has the Atari 50th logo stamped onto its wood veneer trim. Like the previous releases, it was built by AtGames.

The basic model includes two wired standard controllers and 110 games. The gold model includes two wired standard controllers, two wired paddle controllers and 130 games.

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition Gold
summary: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition Gold is a plug-and-play retro console released by AtGames to commemorate Atari’s 50-year legacy. It includes 130 built-in Atari 2600 classics, two wired standard joysticks, and two wired paddle controllers. The hardware features HDMI output (720p), wood-veneer styling with “Atari 50th” gold logo, brass switches, and modern additions like save/load and rewind functions for many games. Only the Gold edition supports official firmware updates, allowing expansion of its game library.

name: Atari Flashback Portable
summary: In 2007, Vendel was working on a handheld console known as the Atari Flashback Portable. It would run on three "AAA" batteries, and would include a screen resolution of 320x240. It would feature AV output and two joystick controller ports for multiplayer. Games are loaded into internal 2MB memory by use of a USB cable. The release date was projected as early 2008 with a retail price of approximately $40. However, Vendel announced in 2010 that the project was not going to be released by Atari and no further information was released.

name: Atari Flashback Portable
summary: The third edition of Atari Flashback Portable.

name: Atari Flashback Portable
summary: The fourth edition of Atari Flashback Portable.

name: Atari Flashback Blast! Vol. 1
summary: You'll have a Blast! with this first volume of amazing Atari 2600 classics. Get rid of those pesky bugs in Centipede and Millipede. Battle the Qotile with your Zorlon Cannon in Yars' Revenge, then try it again in Yars' Return. Go on an epic adventure with all three Swordquest series games.

name: Atone
summary: Des 101 - Jam 3 - Theme: Spirits - Group: Lucky 7

name: Atari Retro Handheld Console
summary:
A dedicated handheld with 50 Atari 2600 games.

List of games:

3D Tic-Tac-Toe (31 in 1)
Adventure
Air-Sea Battle
Asteroids
Black Jack

name: Atomic Titans: Light Violence
summary: Embark on a cosmic journey with Atomic Titans: Light Violence, an action-packed casual combat game. Engage in heart-pounding showdowns within the confines of space faring arenas.

name: At Tony's
summary:
At Tony's is a first-person horror experience taking place in a haunted pizzeria.

The last night shift worker vanished mysteriously, it's your turn to step in to help the family's business.

Will you survive your shift, cooking pizzas while unveiling the restaurant's mysteries?

name: A Technician's Nightmare
summary: This is a multiplayer survival game in a haunted house. For 1-4 players The player must successfully complete the mission, during which there will be strange events occurring in the house. Their main objective is to survive and make it back safely.

name: At Night
summary: At Night is a basic horror game about dodging a monster while trying to get to the safe room. Solve puzzles, close windows, lock doors, and run!

name: A Trans Man's Grindr DMs
summary:
From the creator: "This is a curation of Grindr messages I've received. Each of these hold personal significance to me, and I hope that you enjoy reading them as much as I did."

CW: sexual references

name: Atsumare! Guru Guru Onsen BB
summary: Atsumare! Guru Guru Onsen BB (あつまれ！ぐるぐる温泉ＢＢ) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Atlyss
summary: Enter the world of ATLYSS, a single-player/online RPG where you can fight with or against friends in a surreal world filled with creatures beyond comprehension. Customize and progress your character(s), complete quests, and discover strange locations.

name: Atomic Owl
summary: Atomic Owl is a pixel art-based single-player, side-scrolling roguelite that combines fast-paced platforming with dynamic hack-and-slash combat and a variety of weapons, powerups, and a demonic blade. Journey through eight roguelite zones, save your friends, and take up arms against Omega Wing!

name: Atlas Wars
summary: Join the epic world of Atlas Wars, a fast-paced skill-based multiplayer brawler! Choose unique heroes, master awesome abilities, and battle in crazy and unique arenas. Atlas Wars offers an action-packed brawl experience!

name: Atlas Ablaze
summary: When 16 year old Andi falls for the last person her parents would approve of, she seems to have trouble processing the severity of her girlfriend's situation. Cute visuals and crude humor helps to mask dark topics in the way that puts you in the headspace of a teenage girl trying to shut it all out.

name: At His Grave
summary: Time backtracking secret room decryption game, analyze the character dialogue, find the key to decryption, complete the needs to leave the room. In the end all regret, go back to the past, looking for clues to make up for regret.

name: Atan
summary: Atan is an action-adventure game where you traverse a massive colossal. Use your climbing skills together with your bow and anchors to journey over the massive giant. But beware, because this rough terrain contains many challenges, for the colossal itself is still alive and in need of your help.

name: Athanasy + Ceiba Bundle
summary: The visual novels from Wirion will delight with a deeply thought-out world, colorful characters, and a unique Biopunk-style aesthetic.

name: A-Train
summary:
You play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating your own railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for your chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.

The main money earners are passenger trains, that can be scheduled to pick up passengers at the times of day when the demand is high. However, in the long term you need the city to develop. This requires setting up trains that transport resources to where they are needed. These resources are used to build houses, and other buildings, increasing the number of passengers for your commuter trains.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. You can also build your own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

name: A-Train
summary:
You play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating your own railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for your chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.
